body:
PR 687 (resolves issue #684 ): Fix a failure when reading data from a parquet file (and not a parquet directory).
PR 686 (resolves issue #685 ): Silenty omit fields that have unsupported types. Previously were failing loudly making parquet stores with such fields unusable with Petastorm.

name: v0.9.3
body:
Thanks to our new contributors: Travis Addair and Ryan (rb-determined-ai).

- Retire support for Python 2.
- [PR 568](https://github.com/uber/petastorm/pull/568): Added additional kwargs for Spark Dataset Converter.
- [PR 564](https://github.com/uber/petastorm/pull/564): Expose filters (PyArrow filters) argument in make_reader and make_batch_reader
This release has breaking changes. See our [migration guide](doc/migrating-0.3.0.md) on how to convert code from previous versions.
Making opencv dependency into an extra dependency.
